column1: Local Foods////I've tried the Duck Confit sandwich
column3: and the Truffled Egg Salad. You cannot go wrong with anything they offer and don't be afraid to ask for samples. The staff is kind
column5: and the place has integrity. You can't beat a combination like that... unless you're combining shrimp and crab I suppose. I'd throw my morals out the window for that sandwich...
